member.name: T:Talegen.Backchannel.BackchannelClient

member.name: M:Talegen.Backchannel.BackchannelClient.Authenticate(System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates the client with the specified scopes in a synchronous manor.
member.param: Contains the scopes that are requested for the client credentials authentication.
member.returns: Returns the result of the authentication.

member.name: M:Talegen.Backchannel.BackchannelClient.AuthenticateAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: This method is used to retrieve and authorize the client for back-channel communication to the Identity API.
member.param: Contains the scopes that are requested for the client credentials authentication.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating whether the authentication was successful.
member.exception: The exception is thrown if an issue occurs during discovery or client authentication.

member.name: T:Talegen.Backchannel.ClientAuthenticationMethods
member.summary: Contains an enumerated list of SDK client authentication methods.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.ClientAuthenticationMethods.ClientCredentials
member.summary: The client shall authenticate with a client secret.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.ClientAuthenticationMethods.ResourceOwnerPassword
member.summary: The client shall authenticate with the resource owner using a user id and password.
member.remarks: The spec recommends using the resource owner password grant only for "trusted" (or legacy) applications.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.ClientAuthenticationMethods.Delegation
member.summary: This method shall allow a client token to be exchanged for another from the authority for client delegation with another API.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [use discovery for endpoint].

member.name: P:Talegen.Backchannel.BackchannelConfig.UserId
member.summary: Gets or sets the user name used for password client authentication.

member.name: P:Talegen.Backchannel.BackchannelConfig.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password used for password client authentication.

member.name: T:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorType
member.summary: Contains an enumerated list of error message types.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorType.Fatal
member.summary: Errors that have unexpectedly ended the intended process.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorType.Critical
member.summary: Errors that were expected and ended the intended process.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorType.Warning
member.summary: Errors that can be handled and allow a process to continue.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorType.Validation
member.summary: Errors that occur before a process starts.

member.name: T:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorCategory
member.summary: Contains an enumerated list of error message types.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorCategory.General
member.summary: General errors not categorized.
member.remarks: All other errors that do not fall within the other categories.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorCategory.Security
member.summary: Security related errors.
member.remarks: Errors related to permissions would be good candidates for Application errors.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorCategory.Application
member.summary: Application related errors not security related.
member.remarks: Errors related to a process failing would be good candidates for Application errors.

member.name: F:Talegen.Backchannel.Models.ErrorCategory.System
member.summary: System related errors that are not security related.
member.remarks: IO or database related issues would be good candidates for System errors.

member.name: P:Talegen.Backchannel.Properties.Resources.AccessMethodRequiresTokenErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified access method requires an access token be specified in the configuration..

member.name: P:Talegen.Backchannel.Properties.Resources.IntrospectionConfigNeededErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An introspection endpoint must be specified to verify client access token access. Either enable discovery or specify an introspection endpoint in configuration..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A component identity or unique file name must be specified in the editor request..

member.name: P:Talegen.Backchannel.Properties.Resources.InvalidRequestTypeErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Request method must be POST, PUT, or DELETE.

member.name: P:Talegen.Backchannel.Properties.Resources.TokenIntrospectionInvalidErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The access token specified was not valid..
